"...Damn! I can't believe that Shiva!": "It's not right. We can't use Photons at all..."
"Everyone's working so hard, but they can't even make a dent..."
"I couldn't protect anything... I was completely useless. Was there anything I could have done...?"
"You're right... We did do everything we could. But it still wasn't enough."
"...I won't give up. We can still make a difference, right? Even I should be able to help."
"I won't just follow orders. I want to think for myself, and make choices I won't regret."
"I may not be that strong... but I'll fight as hard as I can."
"Maybe even enough to earn your praise..."
"Ah, th-that's... That's not what I meant!"
"...W-Well, I'm going to go search for something I can do! See you later, <me>!"
